I-I can't die here! Not yet!
If I fall... am I truly saved?
The weight of so many sins... I can't carry it.
So much blood... I can't let it happen again.
Evil is everywhere.
You writhe under masks of flesh.
I've put entire hamlets to the torch. Yours is no different.
A purge cleanses more than just monsters.
I see the darkness within you all. I will be watching.
You think I have an aversion to pain?
I have a whip, and the will to use it.
This suffering only vindicates my methods.
I've burned villages. This is nothing.
Come on, filth. Work for it.
I will warm myself on your funeral pyres.
You exist because I allow it.
You lack discipline, piety, tact, or usefulness.
Weak. Inexperienced. Naive.
We will die down here and it will be your fault.
I know what I am doing.
If you don't trust me implicitly, why would I work for it?
I have the experience to put these things down.
This is for your own good.
Don't get too attached.
The weight of so many lives...
How many innocents did I condemn?
All this death. Am I truly doing the right thing?
No matter how many I kill, they are replaced tenfold.
This world will end in darkness. I cannot save it.

The intolerable cacophany of squeaking shoes!
No! Balloon animals!!
Tangled wigs! Red hair! Bloody red hair!
Terror! Madness! Laughter!
Now is not the time to shirk your duty!
Death comes! Meet it with steel!
Paradise awaits!
Not courage. Confidence.
A stake for that one. Silver for the next. The rest: dismemberment.
There! Their weakness revealed!
I am your hope! A shining beacon in blackest night!
No psalms of hope, no prayers of mercy. Only steel, and will.

How could I fear something so pitiful?

By my faith, be elevated!
We've come so far -- do not falter now!
I will create an opening, follow my lead.

Nomad Convoy
Amongst this week's caravan are a peculiar group of women bearing sigils of the Holy Flame, insisting their help is needed to aid the estate's ailing faith.
Free Fortunes
... Those looking for advice in love, harvest, or wealth can seek her out amongst the nomad wagons in the town square...

The body is a temple. Show me to a stone one.

The Omen Seeker makes use of a wide variety of monster hunting tools and weapons, which she uses to great effect to debilitate and exploit weaknesses of the creatures she hunts. Her wagon conceals a powerful symbol of the Flame used to disable opponents, and her unique brew of offensive holy water purifies bleeding and blighted monsters with dizzying effectiveness.

A consecrated whip remains the Omen Seeker's most reliable weapon; striking the rear ranks, dragging them out of position and opening them up to further assault by the Omen Seeker's wide arsenal. Her unique physiology prevents her from wearing heavy armor, but she more than makes up the deficiency with deft speed.

A nomad by birth and inquisitor by trade, the Omen Seeker is never far from her wagon. With a well stocked larder and soft beds, it features the comforts of home while providing a safe respite for the party. Her profession as a monster hunter affords her an assortment of relevant texts, and her skill in divination provides relief from an uncertain future.

The Omen Seeker makes use of a wide variety of monster hunting tools and weapons, which she uses to great effect to debilitate and exploit weaknesses of the creatures she hunts. Her wagon conceals a powerful symbol of the Flame used to disable opponents, and her unique brew of offensive holy water purifies bleeding and blighted monsters with dizzying effectiveness.

A consecrated whip remains the Omen Seeker's most reliable weapon; striking the rear ranks, dragging them out of position and opening them up to further assault by the Omen Seeker's wide arsenal. Her unique physiology prevents her from wearing heavy armor, but she more than makes up the deficiency with deft speed.

A nomad by birth and inquisitor by trade, the Omen Seeker is never far from her wagon. With a well stocked larder and soft beds, it features the comforts of home while providing a safe respite for the party. Her profession as a monster hunter affords her an assortment of relevant texts, and her skill in divination provides relief from an uncertain future.
"Entangle"
"Expunge"
"Piercing Dagger"

Whalebone Corset
Steel Ribbed Corset
"Spinekeeper"
Reinforced Corset

Pass.
The body is a temple. Show me to a stone one.

The Omen Seeker makes use of a wide variety of monster hunting tools and weapons, which she uses to great effect to debilitate and exploit weaknesses of the creatures she hunts. Her wagon conceals a powerful symbol of the Flame used to disable opponents, and her unique brew of offensive holy water purifies bleeding and blighted monsters with dizzying effectiveness.

A consecrated whip remains the Omen Seeker's most reliable weapon; striking the rear ranks, dragging them out of position and opening them up to further assault by the Omen Seeker's wide arsenal. Her unique physiology prevents her from wearing heavy armor, but she more than makes up the deficiency with deft speed.

A nomad by birth and inquisitor by trade, the Omen Seeker is never far from her wagon. With a well stocked larder and soft beds, it features the comforts of home while providing a safe respite for the party. Her profession as a monster hunter affords her an assortment of relevant texts, and her skill in divination provides relief from an uncertain future.
"Entangle"
"Expunge"
"Piercing Dagger"

The Omen Seeker makes use of a wide variety of monster hunting tools and weapons, which she uses to great effect to debilitate and exploit weaknesses of the creatures she hunts. Her wagon conceals a powerful symbol of the Flame used to disable opponents, and her unique brew of offensive holy water purifies bleeding and blighted monsters with dizzying effectiveness.

A consecrated whip remains the Omen Seeker's most reliable weapon; striking the rear ranks, dragging them out of position and opening them up to further assault by the Omen Seeker's wide arsenal. Her unique physiology prevents her from wearing heavy armor, but she more than makes up the deficiency with deft speed.

A nomad by birth and inquisitor by trade, the Omen Seeker is never far from her wagon. With a well stocked larder and soft beds, it features the comforts of home while providing a safe respite for the party. Her profession as a monster hunter affords her an assortment of relevant texts, and her skill in divination provides relief from an uncertain future.
"Entangle"
"Expunge"
"Piercing Dagger"

The Omen Seeker makes use of a wide variety of monster hunting tools and weapons, which she uses to great effect to debilitate and exploit weaknesses of the creatures she hunts. Her wagon conceals a powerful symbol of the Flame used to disable opponents, and her unique brew of offensive holy water purifies bleeding and blighted monsters with dizzying effectiveness.

A consecrated whip remains the Omen Seeker's most reliable weapon; striking the rear ranks, dragging them out of position and opening them up to further assault by the Omen Seeker's wide arsenal. Her unique physiology prevents her from wearing heavy armor, but she more than makes up the deficiency with deft speed.

A nomad by birth and inquisitor by trade, the Omen Seeker is never far from her wagon. With a well stocked larder and soft beds, it features the comforts of home while providing a safe respite for the party. Her profession as a monster hunter affords her an assortment of relevant texts, and her skill in divination provides relief from an uncertain future.

The Omen Seeker makes use of a wide variety of monster hunting tools and weapons, which she uses to great effect to debilitate and exploit weaknesses of the creatures she hunts. Her wagon conceals a powerful symbol of the Flame used to disable opponents, and her unique brew of offensive holy water purifies bleeding and blighted monsters with dizzying effectiveness.

A consecrated whip remains the Omen Seeker's most reliable weapon; striking the rear ranks, dragging them out of position and opening them up to further assault by the Omen Seeker's wide arsenal. Her unique physiology prevents her from wearing heavy armor, but she more than makes up the deficiency with deft speed.

A nomad by birth and inquisitor by trade, the Omen Seeker is never far from her wagon. With a well stocked larder and soft beds, it features the comforts of home while providing a safe respite for the party. Her profession as a monster hunter affords her an assortment of relevant texts, and her skill in divination provides relief from an uncertain future.

寻兆者使用各种各样的怪物狩猎工具和武器，她使用这些工具和武器来削弱和利用她所猎杀的生物的弱点。她的马车隐藏了一个强大的圣火符文，用来使对手致残，她特制的混合圣水可以净化流血，并且伴随着眩晕效果腐蚀怪物。
祝福的鞭子依旧是先兆探索者最可靠的武器；打击后方队伍，将他们拖离阵地，并让他们受到进一步的攻击。她独特的生理特征使她无法穿上厚重的盔甲，但她以灵巧的速度弥补了这一缺陷。
作为一个天生的游牧民和一个会做生意的审判者，寻兆者从不远离她的马车。马车里有一个库存充足的食品储藏室和柔软的床，它的特点是如家的舒适，同时提供了一个安全的休息地点。作为一个怪物猎手，她的职业为她提供了一系列相关的书籍，她的占卜技巧也为她从犹豫不决的未来中做出选择提供了帮助。
